des: "This is a tangy vinaigrette--wonderful on mixed greens, tomato, onion and cucumber salads.  It's also good if used sparingly over steamed veggies or stir-frys. Sometimes I use traditional balsamic vinegar.  However, this will produce a slightly sweeter vinaigrette."
ins: In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, white balsamic vinegar, garlic, and mustard powder.  Season to taste with salt and black pepper. Stir in minced fresh herbs if desired.
